lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo gave Zinedine Zidane a ringing endorsement as Real Madrid coach after their 1-0 defeat by Atletico Madrid in the city derby at the Bernabeu on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Ronaldo Backs Zidane After First Defeat as Real Coach
headline.main: Ronaldo Backs Zidane After First Defeat as Real Coach

snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo gave Zinedine Zidane a ringing endorsement as Real Madrid coach after their 1-0 defeat by Atletico Madrid in the city derby at the Bernabeu on Saturday....
